[b][color=white]Stop Abusing Edit Feature[/color][/b]
After a member got closed, Omniscient warned us that eventually we'll lose the ability to edit posts. You are not allowed to edit your threads and destroy the content inside it which turns the thread into a LQP and useless thread. Especially if you do it to a mass amount of threads. We lost junk feature because of this abuse, let's not lose edit feature.[i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5701152&pid=55737113#pid55737113] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]API v2 Status Update[/color][/b]
Summer is a busy season for Omniscient so we'll probably see the v2 update sometime around October or November. Just a quick update :)[i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5663026&pid=55733985#pid55733985] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Trigonometry is Much Older Than we Previously Thought[/color][/b] 
As we all already know, trigonometry is the study of the lengths and angles of triangles. A 3700-year-old clay tablet points towards the Babylonians making use of it over a thousand years before the Greeks. This tablet hosts four columns and fifteen rows of inscribed cuneiform. The clay tablet, first discovered in the 1900s, had flown under the radar until the 1940s. That was when researchers and historians picked up on the inscriptions resembling that of the Pythagorean theorem.  If any of you would like to see this insight into the past, it is currently residing at Columbia University. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.sciencemag.org/news/2017/08/ancient-babylonian-tablet-may-contain-first-evidence-trigonometry]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Study Suggests Flame-Retardant Chemicals may Cause Infertility[/color][/b] 
Yet one more thing those of us out there may need to be on the look out for. This study isn't entirely conclusive, but they do make some fairly compelling links. They found that over 80 percent of women having fertility treatment at the Massachusetts General Hospital had traces of these chemicals in their urine. They also found that individuals with high levels of these chemicals are 38 percent less likely to have a child after a cycle of in vitro fertilization treatment. The team encourages caution when purchasing furniture containing these chemicals to those looking to be mothers and hopes safer substitutes will be looked into.  [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.independent.co.uk/news/science/female-fertility-chemicals-gym-mats-furniture-threat-warning-study-flame-retardant-a7911091.html]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]High School Popularity Does not Translate Into Long-Term Happiness[/color][/b] 
It may mean the world to you at the moment; however, this study alleges that fostering long-lasting friendships are real what impact one's happiness. The study, recently published in the journal Child Development, followed 169 adults for 10 years throughout adulthood. These adults would be quizzed about social anxiety, self-worth, and symptoms of depression. Those participating in the study were also asked to identify their best friend, who was also requested similar questions. All this, over that 10 year period, was enough to lead them straight to the conclusion that it is far more important to establish lifelong friendships than to be surrounded by people that know little about you. Sounds like common sense in the first place, doesn't it? [i][size=x-small][url=http://abcnews.go.com/Health/high-school-popularity-lead-happiness-study-finds/story?id=49355214]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Samsung Galaxy Note 8 Comes With a 6.3-Inch Screen[/color][/b]
The Galaxy Note 8 is here, and Samsung is cheerful that customers who value the Note's components and its mark stylus will give the brand another shot following quite a while of hearing notices on board planes and other open travel about the threats and potential for devastation postured by the reviewed cell phone. The name hasn't changed. It is a Galaxy Note completely, and it's unquestionably the most delightful one Samsung has ever constructed. Preorders start tomorrow on all the real US transporters, and an opened model will be accessible at dispatch surprisingly. The Note 8 will be discharged in stores on September fifteenth. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.theverge.com/circuitbreaker/2017/8/23/16186496/samsung-galaxy-note-8-2017-announced-features-price-release-date]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Muting Websites in Google Chrome[/color][/b]
Google Chrome will soon allow its users to mute websites, a component that will convey happiness to millions who endure auto-playing recordings on (irritating) sites each day. Spotted by Android Police, the element is presently accessible in the exploratory Canary form of the browser. 
At present you can quiet tabs in Chrome tabs by right clicking on them; however, the procedure is counterbalanced once you close the tab or Chrome. When this component advances from Canary to the general population work of Chrome, which will take half a month, in any event, you will have the capacity to put sites on changeless lockdown with only a couple of clicks. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.theverge.com/2017/8/25/16203046/google-chrome-mute-websites-tabs-permanently]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Microsoft Stops Selling The Original Xbox one[/color][/b]
Microsoft is never again offering its unique Xbox One in the US. The product monster just offers retail forms of the Xbox One S and Xbox One X at its online store, with just $199 revamped models of the first Xbox One accessible. Kotaku UK reports that while the first Xbox One has vanished from the US store, Microsoft's UK store just records the old console as "sold out." 
Microsoft propelled the Xbox One S a year ago with a thinned down look in a white robot style and furthermore quit fabricating the Xbox 360. The smaller console was broadly commended over the first reassure's plan, and furthermore, included 4K bolster for Blu-beam plates and applications like Netflix and Amazon Video. Microsoft is currently concentrating on the Xbox One S for the section reassure, and its forthcoming Xbox One X for hardcore Xbox fans. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.theverge.com/2017/8/25/16206532/microsoft-xbox-one-original-console-discontinued]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Monster Hunter: World Will Get Free DLC[/color][/b] 
In the past gamers who played the Monster Hunter series received free DLC packages for the games that they purchased. Decades later, this still is going on because in the latest game Monster Hunter: World which will be released in 2018, players are automatically entitled to getting a free copy of the DLC that comes with the game. The game will be available on PS4, Xbox One, and PC. The developers expect the players to be constantly online which is why the quests they will be offering in the DLC will be jam packed with fun and keep the players busy for hours. The executive producer says, Kaname Fujioka. "“We have made sure we are putting the volume of gameplay people expect from a Monster Hunter." If you had not had the chance to see gameplay of the game yet, check out [url=https://youtu.be/WoqoLcMmERg]this[/url] awesome 12-minute gameplay video. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.polygon.com/2017/8/23/16191034/monster-hunter-world-free-dlc-downloadable-content]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]HTC Could Be Getting out of the VR Business[/color][/b] 
HTC is not doing too well when it comes to the VR business. They have a reported loss of $513 million throughout the year of 2016. Most recently HTC hired a strategic adviser to assist them with their sales. One of the things that the adviser suggest may seem surprising to some which were to discontinue their product in the VR line. Rumors report that HTC has been talking to Google for a deal to transfer ownership of the product. The company itself has been struggling the past few years with not only the VR device they sell but their phones too. Their stocks have dropped and their sales percentages have plummeted since 2014. The price of the HTC Vive is much more expensive than the Oculus Rift and PlayStations VR device but still, has popularity. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.pcgamer.com/htc-could-be-getting-out-of-the-vr-business/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Overwatch: Mercy Changes[/color][/b] 
The game director of Overwatch, Jeff Kaplan recently made directors update video on YouTube about one of the heroes in the game. The hero in the video was the beloved healing Goddess, Mercy. She will be getting some changes soon so those who like to main her, this may be a perfect article for you. The first thing that is being changed is her ultimate. Everyone who is familiar with her ultimate knows it is the ability to res (resurrect) or in other words revive teammates. Kaplan stated that many people wondered why Mercy had one less ability than other players. She only had the ability to heal and give a damage boost, a pistol which is not abilities and guardian angel which allowed her to leap to nearby locked on players.  So with that being said, Mercy's ultimate is getting a complete revamp. Her resurrection ultimate is now going to be a usable ability with a long cooldown. Not only is it a long cooldown, but now it is single target only, as opposed to the multiple res ability it had before. You will no longer have the ability to res your whole team who died on the point. In short, resurrection is a common ability and not an ultimate. In replacement of her resurrection, Mercy will be getting a new ult named, "Valkrie". The fun thing about this is that it gives you multiple things you can do in the ult. First off, when you activate it you will have the ability to fly. No gimmicks here, really fly. Not like the Pharah boost where you need to keep tapping to stay in the air. You are flying like a true angel Mercy is. You get full control of Mercy when you are flying. Take a look [url=https://gfycat.com/gifs/detail/imaginaryimaginativefugu]here[/url]. Second, everything she does gets a little boost. When Valkrie is used, her staff will have longer range, giving her the ability to beam targets with the heal or damage beam from a greater distance and chain to all teammates around the one getting hit with the beam. This means if you are healing Reaper while your ultimate is up, any teammate around reaper will also be getting healed too. Same applies with the damage boost in when ulting. In addition, she can also use her guardian angel from farther distances too. Those who like to use her pistol and feel that it is useless, do not worry this will get a boost too during the ult! She now has the ability to shoot faster and deal more damage. The new ultimate lasts only 20 seconds and if you used a resurrect prior to using the ult, it will reset as well as go on a reduced cooldown of 10 seconds during the duration of the Valkrie ult. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.pcgamer.com/overwatch-mercy-changes/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]
